qas.question: How is the air quality in Boston?
How many days between 2004 and 2013 was the air unhealthy?
Who determined that the air quality was unhealthy on those 4 days?

context: Air quality in Boston is <a0_0>generally very good<a0_0/>: during the ten-year period 2004–2013, there were only <a1_0>4 days<a1_0/> in which the air was unhealthy for the general public, according to <a2_0>the EPA<a2_0/>.
